ygData.subject: Computer Double Screen
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it s been a month now since SOL has been released and I have not yet been able to play it. After 50 minutes on hold waiting to talk to the tech reps and
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it's been a month now since SOL has been
released and I have not yet been able to play it. After 50
minutes on hold waiting to talk to the tech reps and
numerous emails, I am no closer of getting the problem
fixed as I was before. When I go into EQ it is fine
through the server select screen, but when it goes to
loading the game I get the left side of the screen
overlapping onto about 1/4 of the right side. Tech support
says update your video driver, I have to no
avail.<br><br>I am very frustrated and hoping that someone may
have a suggestion.<br><br>Thanks for taking the time
to read this
post.<br><br>Dave<br><br>aka<br><br>Wizzkid 51 wizard<br>Reptilious 34 shammy<br>and 5
others.<br><br>Xegony server
